dc_description_s: This ESRI Geodatabase contains polygon features and attribute data tables for census data for the country of Peru. The data is derived from the PERU Instituto Nactional de Estadistica e Informatica and was released in 2007. The data contain 1850 census boundary polygons that each have 250 attributes, and the lowest administrative boundary level represented is the Distrito. Refer to the documentation for a list of variables and a translation of variable titles into English. For more information on the census methodology and a glossary of variable categories, go to the INEI website at https://www.inei.gob.pe/.
